metadata.title: CVE-2016-5825 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: The icalparser_parse_string function in libical 0.47 and 1.0 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) via acrafted ics file.

criterions.comment: libical: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
